== Summary ==

* We discussed preliminary plans for a Hardy Heron release party.  For now at least we have decided to have a few different places for parties.  The parties would be at the same time and we would have a webcast setup to bring them together.  

* Ubucon 2008 was discussed.  We discussed the possibility of having Ubucon at the Columbus Metropolitan Library (Hilliard).  

* Various other topics were discussed like normal. :-)
